website_summaries.verdict: There is no doubt that babies absolutely love this jumper — one thing that almost every owner of the product agrees on.
pros: Swaying is minimal when the baby jumps
Interesting toys keep the baby occupied
cons: Some have complained of the seat turning over if the baby leans out too far
It does not fit door frames wider than 16.5 cm
It might be a little difficult to figure out the instructions for adjusting the belts

customer_reviews.title: Allows me to shower!
customer_reviews.text: Husband ordered this after my complaints of not being able to shower with my LO growing out of her rock and play. This jumper is super easy to set up and remove. I put it in the doorway of our bathroom which is right in front of the shower and I can see her the whole time! She has fun jumping in it as you can see!
customer_reviews.author: AnnaMolly

customer_reviews.title: Best thing to give you two hands again.
customer_reviews.text: Since I'm home all day with the little one I was struggling to get a lot done since she was always wanting me to entertain her. As soon as she was a letter to hold her head steady we put this up. She is a bit skinny for her to not have her arms fall through the leg holds. However, it was an easy fix by having some folded up blankets around her. I wish there was an insert we could buy that would be easier, but not a big deal. She loves bouncing in this. She would stay in this for hours if I let ler. It's nice and secure on the door frame.
customer_reviews.author: Ariya

customer_reviews.title: It was great until it malfunctioned
customer_reviews.text: I truly did love this jumper. It easily would’ve gotten 5 stars from me. I've had it for about 3 months and my daughter loved it. Last week she was jumping in it and out of nowhere all of the slack from adjusting the height came undone sending my 6 month old crashing to the ground. Thank god she wasn't hurt. It could have been a lot worse. Needless to say I'm terrified to put her in this again. She weighs 18lbs.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: It will not fit on any of our door ways ...
customer_reviews.text: It will not fit on any of our door ways. We have an older home that has 5" wide and 5" high jams so it has to be sent back. Door jam limits should be included in the description.
customer_reviews.author: janee665

customer_reviews.title: These are great jumpers, but there's one major issue
customer_reviews.text: These are great jumpers, but there's one major issue. We have it tightened and raised up as much as it will allow and my son's knees are still on the floor. And the thing is, he's just going to keep getting heavier which means the problem will increase. And he's actually younger than the recommended age so he's definitely not too big and/or heavy. My mother had to double over the straps and sew them up to make it shorter.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine P

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit over my trim, but it's good quality
customer_reviews.text: These things are terrifying to me in theory, but in practicality it seems quite safe now that I've used it. My baby loves it. I just wish I could've made it work in a door way. I have 1x6" Craftsman/farmhouse trim over my doors. It won't fit over it. So I screwed some 1x4 s into a header to make it work. We are remodeling, so it will be ok when I'm done I'll just fill holes and paint over them. Just something to consider before buying.
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: Baby Love!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece for Christmas. Her parents and big brother live in a little apartment in Seattle; and there wasn't a lot of extra room for an on-the-floor walker or bouncer. This has less of a footprint; AND it has a little tray to put toys on with a bumper going all the way around it - unlike older versions of this jumper. Safer and FUN for baby. She loved it - and so do her parents. (Big brother who is going on three likes to pull on it as he runs by, though - watch out for other kids hanging and pulling on it.)
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Mostly

customer_reviews.title: Hours of entertainment.
customer_reviews.text: Both of my boys have spent hours in this thing. Still works and looks as good as the day we got it. This is a lifesaver. It gives them freedom to sit up and see what's going on while they bounce off some energy and gives them a safe place to play while you take care of boring grown-up stuff! The tray/bumper is nice because it gives them a buffer between them and the door jam and it also gives them a place for toys to sit and for them to lean on between jumps. The seat is very sturdy and washes well.
customer_reviews.author: White Owl

customer_reviews.title: The height adjustment is very easy too although I do wish it had the option ...
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES his bumper jumper. The installation couldn't have been any simpler, you just pull apart and place it above your doorframe. The height adjustment is very easy too although I do wish it had the option to go a little higher as our baby is quite tall. If it had the ability to be shortened even more this would be a five star review. Super simple to clean, just wipe down with a wet wipe. He enjoys this more than his Baby Einstein stationary bouncer and his legs don't get stuck when I pull him out like they do in the Baby Einstein also.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie M

customer_reviews.title: the best $28 I've ever spent
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves this jumper, and happily bounces in it an hour at a time, several times a day, and has done since about 4 months of age when she developed decent head/neck control. She gets bored in the boppy, feels too constrained in wraps and carriers, so this was a godsend. And it makes for some super cute videos. We hang it from doorways and also overhead beams that are at 8 feet overhead. See photo, you might want to do yours differently, or cap the ends of the plywood so it can't migrate, but we haven't had any problems with our setup.
customer_reviews.author: Urso

customer_reviews.title: It's alright
customer_reviews.text: It seems like the area where the baby's leg go is wide and if the child is left in it for a while it would hurt their little thighs. But other than that it's the same concept as the more expensive jolly jumper and a bit safer for my grandson with the bumper around it than the ones i used when my kids were little. i would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mad71

customer_reviews.title: Great price, well made
customer_reviews.text: Great price, well made, cute print, easy to adjust, my baby loves bouncing in it. I live in an older home and have irregular, larger door frames, but the hook at the top still fits well. I wish the seat wasn't so big around the waste area or had some way to adjust the seat size. My 4-month old is swimming in it practically, but he still loves it and it leaves room to grow. For now, I wedge blankets in around him.
customer_reviews.author: Occamy Box

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 6 month old granddaughter!
customer_reviews.text: She loves it and she screeches with joy as she jumps! Seems sturdy and safe. Another reviewer said the tray made her baby feel more secure (it is why I bought this one) and I would have to agree! Only downside I can see is that as her legs are getting longer, the main strap doesn't adjust up any further. I am sure we can find some way to do it...
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria B.

customer_reviews.title: Bounced himself silly.
customer_reviews.text: We had a jumper when my daughter was born and I remember her loving it , when my grandson was born I bought this one. Once he could hold himself in a sitting position we put him in it. He bounced himself silly. I love the bumpers on the edge of the tray that kept him from banging into the doorway. He used it till he learned to walk. After that he wouldn’t stay in it. It was a little hard to adjust the height after taking down and putting back up but becomes easier as you get the hang of it. Would be perfect if this could be clipped at a certain height then loosed as they grow.
customer_reviews.author: Ria

customer_reviews.title: Excellent/safe/fun/and Mommy even says, Great invention !
customer_reviews.text: My Great-grandson loves it. He is almost walking/ alone, but not quite. So he jumps and awe, he does his little hopping/around/ like squats/ exercises, but he does not think of it as exercise. First thing in the A.M. when he gets up, he wants immediately to/get into the bumper jumper/ bear trail. His Mommy also feels/good about it and it is safe. Awesome. She says, "this is a life-saver" to her/as well. M. Smith
customer_reviews.author: George Smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our 5 month old LOVES this! She will happily bounce and spin for up to 20min before getting a little bored. It's great exercise and good practice for standing. We have no issues with adjusting the height. Seems very secure and it's easy to take down and put back up (the top part is like a doctor's stethoscope- no screws or tools required to put up and take down).
customer_reviews.author: FrancescaTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: My baby loves this however the adjustment loops tends to ...
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this however the adjustment loops tends to come loose constantly and I hear a bang with my baby winding up about 2 inches from the ground. This item makes me a little nervous because I'm worried her knees will be locked one time this happens and she'l shatter her knees. If it wasn't for this one tiny thing this would be the ideal bouncer for our baby.
customer_reviews.author: Kuzya

customer_reviews.title: Works great, needs longer and shorter length adjustment
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it between the ages of 5-7 months. He's just turned 7 months and unfortunately, this bouncer cannot adjust its height anymore, so my son's feet and body are too close to the ground. Now, he's only a few inches off of the ground when he wits in it so I'll be giving this away to another baby this week. My house has normal/lower ceilings I'm assuming.
customer_reviews.author: zmath

customer_reviews.title: His Favorite Toy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely his favorite toy ad the best investment. It hangs securely, moves easily, they tray is perfect. He would play in it for hours. Wish it could be made a little taller as he is very tall for his age! The print matches his room theme (not that we use it in the nursery)
customer_reviews.author: judy38732

customer_reviews.title: Good product, works well you baby will be happy you purchased it :)
customer_reviews.text: Works great...would recommend to anyone with the need to get their baby some exercise, keep them occupied and give them another daily activity to do and enjoy. Our son loved it from 6 months till he was about 1 year old. We've since retired it from usage but it served us well.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mindev

customer_reviews.title: A fun and safe activity for baby!
customer_reviews.text: Once my grandson could hold his head up well unsupported I put him in this Johnny jumper and he loved watching me cook in the kitchen and listen to music. Very safe, secure and great exercise! I ended up buying one for my son and daughter in law’s house too! Easy to assemble and very secure.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to get length appropriate level for baby to bounce
customer_reviews.text: My home is a remodel and our doorways are standard. But the jumper will not shorten far enough for my 10 month old grandson to be able to bounce. It sits too close to the floor at the tightest the straps will go. Needs to be a taller door frame. Otherwise it is precious and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amy k

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our home! Baby loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Our baby absolutely loves this thing. She is able to jump and spin and have a blast while still being entertained by mom/dad. Much more fun than an exersaucer and easy to move around the house. The velcro on the toys is pretty weak, but we just put other toys on the tray for her. The bumper ring on the outside has saved our doors from dents and bangs from baby's jumping.
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for my little guy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my little man who is just now 5 months old. He loved it from the minute I put him in it! At first, he would swing himself from side to side and look all around the room. He is learning how to jump, and he enjoys it more and more every day. I noticed on some of the reviews people have mentioned it being too long or low to the ground...there is an additional adjustment mentioned in the instructions. Also, a previous buyer has mentioned this in the questions about this item and another buyer explained how to fix it. It's a great toy! Wish I had of purchased one when my oldest son was little.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Hunter

customer_reviews.title: So this is pretty much useless for us right now
customer_reviews.text: I have 10 foot ceilings downstairs and this thing doesn't adjust far enough so that we can use it on our large doorways. My son doesn't weigh enough yet so that he can touch the floor. And in our "normal" doorways upstairs, he's too long/heavy and it won't adjust enough in the other direction so that his feet aren't dragging on the floor. So this is pretty much useless for us right now. Maybe when he gets bigger, it will work downstairs, but by that point he'll be walking and won't want to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is completely obsessed with this jumper! At first I thought I had made a mistake not buying her an activity center with the bouncer in it. She very quickly learned to use the jumper and has a blast every day. It's definitely become one of our top 3 baby purchases. She especially seems to love it since she can't crawl yet at 7 months but can move around so much in this jumper. She's loved it since 5 months.
customer_reviews.author: Habiba

customer_reviews.title: You need this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my very active 3 month old to use later on but he's almost 4 months and sits up well and absolutely loves it! It really gives me the hands free moments I need to get things done as well as give him another position to be in besides laying down. It holds onto the door frame with a clamp you just open it and it will hold on, it's very sturdy it feels safe and if I don't want it up I can easily take it down in a second. Does not take up any space either really. I wish I had this for my first
customer_reviews.author: Kelly H.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Our 6 month old grandson loves this. It's well made and easy to put up and adjust. The only somewhat negative is that you need a doorcasing. My son's house only has one on his main floor. Our old house has doorcasings in every doorway so we have several options when he's here.
customer_reviews.author: crunchfament

customer_reviews.title: My baby loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: Worth every smile which comes with it!! Good size. Fits well over the door frame. Sturdy material. Baby cant fall..cant hit the adjacent drawers. Has good foam material in the circumference. Only thing is sometimes getting the baby out might be difficult, especially for one person to handle. The straps might get stuck near the neck or shoulders. Other than that the product is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: adavikolanupani

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Jumper!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase aside from my joovy nook. This doorway jumper is the best! My 6 month old daughter is petite but it is still perfect. She loves it. I can hang it on the bathroom doorway so I can get a shower in lol. But seriously, the price point is fantastic, it’s a sturdy and quiet jumper.
customer_reviews.author: Eri

customer_reviews.title: First time mom here!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product especially for the price.. My little one loves it!! Cant get enough! Just a Warning since this is my first rodeo I will warn other 1st time moms if you see your little one going number 2 GET THEM OUT OUT OUT!!!! I didn't realize where a smell was coming from since mine little kept going up and down ....and then.... the diaper blow out is insane!! You will be wiping for days!! Mine squirms on the changing table so if yours does too make sure you have something to distract them while you clean!
customer_reviews.author: jeannette

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my insane child entertained for more than 5 minutes
customer_reviews.text: My 5 month old is an insane child. This keeps her entertained for at least 30 minutes which is a small miracle. Very portable and easy to set up. Height adjustments are easy and you can attach toys to the support straps so they cant drop them on the floor. I have found that it wont fit around doors with wider/fancy trim but for most normal doors it has not been and issue.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen James Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Nice bouncer, works well, not made for taller babies though.
customer_reviews.text: I wish that this could be raised up higher! I have a tall daughter and she really couldn't use this too long as she was too tall to get it bouncing. It is a nice jumper and I have had lots of friends rave about this specific product...I really wasn't that impressed by it though. It has a strong clasp to attach in doorway. It seems to be made of quality material, and it bounces well. It is hard to get baby in and out of the seat, but we managed. If you have a tall child though, you may want to consider getting a saucer type bouncer instead...
customer_reviews.author: karin

customer_reviews.title: Blessed Jumper!
customer_reviews.text: My goodness. Now my child realizes this thing was made for jumping (about 5 months), he never stops to take a breath. He absolutely LOVES this. He always wants to stand and be on the move (which he can't do on his own), so it's wonderful I have this jumper to give me a break. I love the bumper. It keeps him from running into the doorways and getting hurt. It does get a little difficult if you have a shorter doorway. My boy is 20 lbs. and he hangs too low to the ground to really jump anymore. We've had to figure out how to shorten the straps and still have it be safe. Highly recommend this jumper!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Tried one at a friends house. This one is even nicer. Holds slot of weight. Feels very sturdy when hung (I put alot of weight on it and shook the heck out of it). Easy to adjust height and toys. My son loves it and is a maniac in it....
customer_reviews.author: Nzielinski

customer_reviews.title: Cute design and seems to work but a little tight on my son
customer_reviews.text: We just got it and only use it a couple times and it seems to do what it supposed to however my son is very big for his age and it seems a little small for him. He’s eight months old and 25 pounds. Not sure if we are going to keep it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Like the rubber bumper & tray
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves it! He has a few activity centers that bounce but he never does in them. He goes a little wild in this one. I like that you can move the toys up & down. I clipped a teether on one side & his paci on the other. The rubber bumper that goes all around the bouncer is an added plus. I didn't even know I needed it. My only complaint is the height adjustment. I have it on the highest setting & it's not enough. We just got it so as he gets taller, I'll have to figure something out.
customer_reviews.author: Glory

customer_reviews.title: Good jumper for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 16 lb 8 month old. He loves it and I wish I would've gotten it sooner. Only downfall (and it is for us specifically) is we only have a few doorways with molding that this works on and at 7 ft it needs to get shorter than what it does. An 8 foot doorway would be perfect, but all of our 8 footers are bull-nosed so that is a no go. Again, that is a specific issue with my home and NOT the product!
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Richards

customer_reviews.title: Best gear ever. We take it with us when we travel.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing we've purchased for our infant, he loves it. It took a couple of times for him to get the hang of it (no pun intended.) At first he was bumping into the doorframes and was very uncoordinated. He was also falling asleep in it the first time he used it but once he figured it out, he can't get enough of it. It's a bit hard to put him in and get him out of the swing but it's manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Rozhenko

customer_reviews.title: Excellent spring mechanism, beats the competition
customer_reviews.text: I returned a competing product to go with this. I originally purchased the Evenflo Exersaucer Door Jumper, but this had a VASTLY superior spring mechanism and design, allowing for true jumpy/bouncy behavior. Very well built, get this one. One thing to note, the snack tray thing also doubles as a protective bumper, and would contact a wall before the baby's big head would, which is a nice safety feature if using in narrow doorway.
customer_reviews.author: yarberrymt

customer_reviews.title: but it works just fine. The velcro toys it comes with are cute
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter loves this! She started using it when she was 5 months old and still enjoys it now at 8 months. We don't have very thick door frames, but it works just fine. The velcro toys it comes with are cute, but she could pull them off too easily. I just stuck some other toys on there that she can't pull off. She actually enjoys the toys on their own, though, so no complaints. It's great to put her in while I'm cooking dinner, and I can put it in the living room when I need to vacuum because it's very easy to move from one place to the next. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: AMC

customer_reviews.title: These are wonderful for babies as long as you the parent are ...
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful for babies as long as you the parent are smart enough to use them safely. You need to make sure the door trim is securely fastened and stays that way. This is adjustable ---- again as long as you are smart enough to read and follow directions as well as think things through for yourself. I hate reading reviews where people trash a product because they didn't follow instructions. It is totally adjustable. the hard tray surrounding the seat protects baby and it has a rubbery type of bumper pad around the sides of the tray to protect your door frame. This thing is awesome and my little boy absolutely loves bouncing in it!
customer_reviews.author: S. Miles

customer_reviews.title: What am I missing??? I put the ...
customer_reviews.text: What am I missing??? I put the rivets onto the little thingy with the ridge and they immediately slide off. Called dealer and she sent photo of seat that has been installed. I once again repeat putting the rivets on the little pin and they come off. Rivets too large to stay on the the pin and ridge too small to prevent it from coming right off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase for my little one so far!! He spends a ton of time in this, bouncing & jumping to music! He has never cared for swings or laying on activity mats. Love that it has the bumper to keep him from running into the doorway, and the tray to hold his toys/teethers. This thing is a lifesaver to keep bavy occupied while you do a few chores, he's busy & you can keep an eye. I'll buy another for Grandma's yoo!!
customer_reviews.author: Missy B

customer_reviews.title: A life saver
customer_reviews.text: Hands down one of the best purchases we made for our little guy. He LOVES to bounce! This is the only way we are able to cook dinner, clean, etc. As soon as we put him in the jumper, he is happy! The bumper jumper is sturdy, adjustable, comfortable, and very cute. Does not take up too much space. Would absolutely recommend and would absolutely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got this.
customer_reviews.text: My 5 month old would cry because he didn't want to be laying down so I got this and there are times when he's just happy jumping in this thing to some music, a couple of times he wore himself out and fell asleep in it. It's definitely sturdy, I don't feel like it will break or unlatch from the door frame even in a couple of months when little one gets bigger. The openings for the legs are large enough that it doesn't squeeze. There's a tray and two toys. Definitely glad I got this because that s the only way I can sometimes take a nap lol
customer_reviews.author: Valentin K.

customer_reviews.title: Very hapy
customer_reviews.text: I love this little thing. My 5mo old loves it. It’s easy to set up. The adjustment straps are simple. And overall the make and feel are very strong. I like it and if you have a good doorway to hang it from it’s worth it! Ours is hanging across from the bathroom for those mornings my daughter wakes up while I’m getting ready for work !
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: I also liked the fact this has a tray on it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one, which is more expensive than some, because of the comments on some of the others that the springs were so tight the kiddos were not able to jump much. I also liked the fact this has a tray on it. I am handicapped so cannot spend a lot of time trying to get my grandson out of a tight jumper. This one looked as though I will be able to get him in and out easier.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Havlovic

customer_reviews.title: She likes it
customer_reviews.text: Husband said it was a pain to put the seat in but other then that it was a breeze. She loves bouncing around in it till she gets tired :) i love the bumper on it because she likes spinning in it and ends up hitting the door frame lol
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun for baby!
customer_reviews.text: We got this when my daughter was 5 months, and 3 months later, she still loves it. It's a good place to park her when I need to do something busy like my makeup or cook dinner. I am taking off a star for two reasons: the toys that come with it have super flimsy Velcro loops. She takes the toys down instantly rather than reach up to them. Second, the loop to raise or lower the height is tricky. Be patient with it.
customer_reviews.author: CJpj

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous! Baby jumped and hit his head!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 month old hit his head on the door frame while in this. If you use it don’t use it in a regularly sized door frame. It may be safe to use if you have double doors with a very large space between frames.
customer_reviews.author: RachelAllen828

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Used a jumper for my son 12 years ago and he enjoyed it. Wanted to get one for my newest baby and at $22 I couldn't go wrong. The jumper arrived two days after placing the order in a box that was well packaged to survive shipping. It was easy to finish putting the jumper together as well as adjust the height needed. Product is really durable with surfaces easy to clean and keep clean. My son really enjoys this, jumping, bouncing and twirling away.
customer_reviews.author: Burnetta

customer_reviews.title: This jumper easily secures to the door frame
customer_reviews.text: These little jumpers have come a long way! I purchased this for my grandson and couldn't believe the difference in quality from when my kids were young. This jumper easily secures to the door frame. The springs are far above the baby's head. The strap is easily adjusted and the tray keeps the child from hitting into the door and has rubber around it to prevent damage. The toys that attached and detach are some of my grandsons favorite toys. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: DE2695

customer_reviews.title: but it works well and he seems to really enjoy it. We have narrow door frames
customer_reviews.text: My son is just four months, so we wrap a little blanket around his middle when we put him in the seat, but it works well and he seems to really enjoy it. We have narrow door frames, so the fit over the molding has worked just fine. I like the addition of the bumper. I didn't have that on the previous bouncer for my other two kids.
customer_reviews.author: A Petersen-McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Not a lot of time to use this jumper.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my infant granddaughter who constantly has her feet and legs moving. She loved it for the two months that she was able to use it. By the time she was 8 months old, she had outgrown the amount of adjustments that you can make to raise it. She is on the smaller side for her age, so the jumper may only last until your child is 6 months old if they are bigger in size. Unless you plan to hand it down, you may want to reconsider spending the money for such a short span of time that the baby can use this. However, the quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: L. Langston

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: The seat is a little difficult to snap in but doesn't go anywhere once in place. I like how you can adjust the height level, my 8 week old loves being in this jumper. Super cute and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amber W

customer_reviews.title: Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this bouncer until she grew and I had to adjust it--I carefully followed the written instructions and the bouncer would not stay adjusted; after I adjusted it and put her back in the bouncer, the strap went right through the buckle and her knees were practically on the floor. I've tried about a dozen times to adjust it, following the product instructions very carefully, and it doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Mama T

customer_reviews.title: No strap problem, no complaints at all.
customer_reviews.text: We read most of the reviews about this product and I saw a lot of people saying that the straps fall on there own. We've had this jumper for a few months now and everything seems to work just fine. We haven't had any issues with the straps or anything. I love it, because I can move it so easily around the house when I'm getting ready or when I'm going to be in a different room, I don't have to worry about my daughter in another room in her crib or bassinet. She can be right there with me. We also brought it with us on trips, it's super easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: s_cruz

customer_reviews.title: Great Jumper. Easy to install and adjust the straps
customer_reviews.text: Great Jumper. Easy to install and adjust the straps. Hanged it in the doorway to kitchen so baby girl can watch us cooking. I like the tray. It gives us an additional 20-30 seconds before baby can manage to drop any toy you give her onto the floor for us to fetch :-)
customer_reviews.author: Jenny R

customer_reviews.title: Wish you could raise higher
customer_reviews.text: Great but short lived. We have short doors in our house and this didn’t last long because you couldn’t raise it up any further. Our son is tall for his age and can’t use this anymore. Very sad.
customer_reviews.author: Madison G.

customer_reviews.title: Not for long term
customer_reviews.text: I give this 2 stars because it doesn't let you adjust the height much. My little guy loves his bouncer so we bought the Graco Bamber Jumper to travel with and to keep at the in laws. Our baby boy is pretty tall and heavy and at 4 months old (with the Jumper at the tallest setting) he was way to tall. Of course he still played in it but because of how tall he is and chunky (he also weighed it down) his leg from his knee to feet were on the ground. I would not recommend if you are wanting to use for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Rob and Blake

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality! My little son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality! My little son loves it! One issue that makes it a four star is that the cord that attaches the seat to the spring isn't very adjustable. You'd think you could adjust it to be short or long to fit to different types of doors. Our door is a pretty standard door, so the height isn't much farther above our heads. When we install the jumper and put my son in it, he sags all the way to where his butt is just an inch off the ground. And this is when the seat is adjusted to it's highest point! So when he does bounce, he bounces off the floor every other jump.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen D. Muraoka

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bouncer.  Better than I could have hoped for
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this thing, he has been using it for a little while and he has a blast in it. He is now 9 months and likes to spin around and bounce. It is easy to setup and adjust for the baby size. It has a nice tray for giving him snacks and setting things for him to play with and for him to set things before he throws them to the floor. It has a nice rubber bumper around the outside perimeter and it will protect the walls or anything it hits.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Kohl

customer_reviews.title: A must for active babies
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness, this is a must for our 5 month old son. He is full of energy and has been moving non stop since he was born. I wanted a jumper with a tray to help prevent him from bouncing into the door frame. As a mother with lots of toys that make lots of noise, I especially prefer the silent joy that this toy brings to our home. There are no music makers or squeaking when the baby bounces. We use this everyday. A must for a baby on the move.
customer_reviews.author: Taryn

customer_reviews.title: Great product, baby LOVES. So does MOM!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 7 month old goddaughter. She LOVES IT!! Mom loves the tray feature with bumpers around them, although baby has yet to bump the doorway/wall. Seems to bounce straight up and down without much side movement, but might with older child(?).. does turn but doesn't sway..overall excellent product and best bang for your buck. Easy to install and seems pretty sturdy (Mom always pulls on it before putting baby in)
customer_reviews.author: harmony

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: This has bought me many hours of stress free cooking and cleaning. I move it from room to room while I clean and my little guy has a blast jumping and burning off energy so by the time I need a break so does he! There are no marks oin my walls or door frames from this and it's very sturdy and safe.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Mims

customer_reviews.title: Great for over doorways or arches in living room
customer_reviews.text: My 5 month old LOVES this jumper. Great for over doorways or arches in living room. You need a "lip" above whatever you're planning to hook this jumper to. Love the rubber sides, she bounces harmlessly off the doorframe. The two toys that came with it are great too, very playful and washable. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Annie Foster

customer_reviews.title: Large, but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the dimensions of this product. It’s much larger than I anticipated. The image doesn’t quite do it justice. The tray around the base is quite large. That being said, the clamps work great, I trust that my child won’t fall out of it. I’m keeping it as it was only my lack of research that surprised me.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Best Door Jumper on the Market
customer_reviews.text: Best door jumper on the market! We had a couple of others, and always return them to buy this one! I wish they would change the design up a bit, as I had this same design 4 years ago, and just now when I purchased it again! Either way, well worth the money and a fantastic jumper. Much easier to lower or lift to get correct height with different door settings, super simple to move or travel with, very smooth bounce for baby! I highly recommend this as a gift to someone expecting, or to yourself if you have a little one!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Hartsfield

customer_reviews.title: You CAN completely adjust this MUCH higher! Just make an inward loop!
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected! I even read better instructions from fellow Amazon customers from this product, than Graco's instructions! You CAN completely adjust this MUCH higher! Just make an inward loop!
customer_reviews.author: Los

customer_reviews.title: My 7 month old loved this. Provides tons of laughs and fun
customer_reviews.text: My 7 month old loved this. Provides tons of laughs and fun. The strap is adjustable to different heights but we found it to be a little long even on the shortest length. We will outgrow this faster than I would like. He is now 9 months and is too tall. Only 2 months of fun but he loved every second, so I still think it was worth buying
customer_reviews.author: AND

customer_reviews.title: Little One Loves Us!
customer_reviews.text: Our little one loves this thing! He jumps like crazy and laughs the whole time. My only complaint is that the settings don't let it go very high, so I'm worried he's going to grow out of it quickly. Overall, I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Best jumper I have used...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter started using this around 6 months old and loves it! It is realty nicely made and I can easily put it in a bag (reusable shopping bag) and bring it with me. Which I do often. the only complaint is that the toys it comes with are only held on by a tiny piece of Velcro and come off really easily when she pulls on them. I have substituted them for other ring toys that are harder for her to pull off, so it really isn't a big deal. I am sure this jumper will last through many kids.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Sauer

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I made in a while!
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my niece months before she could sit in it but I waited patiently hntil she turned eight months old ao she could use this. I saw her jumping with and the laughter as she jumped around like a little bunny in circles filled my heart. I've never been so satisfied buying something for someone before. I recommend this for all babies. We got lots of compliments on the jumper too! People always ask where I got it from. It's very well made so you can have a peace of mind too.
customer_reviews.author: NA

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Baby had a blast bouncing in this. I just wish there was an alternative way to hang this, other than on crown molding; we don't have a lot of spots in the house we can use this. Came in one piece and didn't require assembly, which is nice. Just had to insert the liner.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Our son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Our baby loves this thing. I think it may be the best purchase we made. It is inexpensive when it comes to baby products and entertains our baby for 20-30 minutes which is about 15-25 minutes longer than anything else including the expensive baby swing. Some jumpers are just the cloth held up, but I like that this has the bumper around it. He has pushed himself into the door frame but the the bumper he doesn't hit his head on the door frame. It is also really easy to put up. It has a spring loaded clamp, so there is no need to twist or do anything to tighten. I honestly thought there was going to be more work.
customer_reviews.author: kmperkins

customer_reviews.title: She loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bouncer before my gr-granddaughter was born. Kept thinking: wish I'd had one of these back then... She is now six months old and it's her favorite 'toy'. Watching her gleeful bouncing and hearing her squeal with delight makes my day. It fits perfectly, strongly over the door frame with no movement to worry me of it jiggling loose and falling. Buy One! You'll be glad you did too!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia S.

customer_reviews.title: Fun but too long.
customer_reviews.text: The jumper is of good quality but is too long. I read the instructions and you cannot shorten it very much. My daughter loves it right now at 9 months but I will need to find a way to shorten it for future use. This is a serious flaw on this product.
customer_reviews.author: CiCi

customer_reviews.title: Our little guy goes bananas in this and it helps him tire out quickly and sleep better. I'd say it probably has a golden age ...
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive and solidly built. Our little guy goes bananas in this and it helps him tire out quickly and sleep better. I'd say it probably has a golden age range - not sure how well it would work for kids under 5 months, or who are able to pull themselves up to standing on furniture. It works best for us if we pull the cord up so our little guy is further from the ground. If it hangs too low, he doesn't get as excited or jump as much. I'm a huge fan. You never know what your kiddo will love, but this is definitely worth a shot.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: A bit low to the ground but can be fixed.
customer_reviews.text: A lot of reviewers claim that the jumper is too low even at the highest settings. If you read the instruction manual they explain in somewhat difficult to understand diagrams how to make the jumper higher than the highest setting. You need to run the end loop of the strap through the plastic brace again and then it raises the jumper by a lot! The only problem is that after you do it and the baby jumps the strap gets loose and then the jumper is low again. I was able to fix this with a cable tie that prevented the strap from slipping.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L.

customer_reviews.title: So there are some extra steps to do to get it to the right height for any normal baby which is kindof annoying.
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves it! The highest default is too low for our 5 month old. So there are some extra steps to do to get it to the right height for any normal baby which is kindof annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Cosby

customer_reviews.title: I was in love! My LO had the time of his life ...
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I was in love! My LO had the time of his life bouncing and jumping around and kept himself entertained for 30 minute stretches. Alas, he started to gain weight. He's currently 9 months, 19 lbs (yes he's small) and 29 inches (yes he's long). Though he weighs the swing down even on it's highest setting and his feet sit on the ground with knees bent, he still stays entertained. I can see us getting at least one more month of use before passing it along.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: ... of these and all the new moms are very happy with them
customer_reviews.text: Purchased three of these and all the new moms are very happy with them. They love the tray, bumper guard and stable, heavy duty spring! Has the best features than most!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon F.

customer_reviews.title: Great that we can watch her jump and when she ...
customer_reviews.text: Grand daughter loves it..we have a beam that runs throughout kitchen and living room...hubby just screwed same color wood blocks on each side of beam and hung it ..Great that we can watch her jump and when she leaves we just unhook and store..hope this helps..it is made so well...jump, jump 😀
customer_reviews.author: Stacy D. Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Pure enjoyment!
customer_reviews.text: Had something very similar to this 20 years ago when our children were little and it was well loved by all three. We recently made this purchase for our first grandchild and he absolutely loves it! He got the hang of it quickly (he’s a genius by the way😉) and immediately fusses when he’s subjected to the stationary bouncer that won’t reciprocate his action. His parents have since ordered him one. Lol. Highly recommend this to anyone with casings around their doorways.
customer_reviews.author: jlangille

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: I guess I missed the prime jumping time for my little dude, as he had about three days of using this jumper before he was officially too tall. The seat is well-constructed, and I appreciate the extra little toys it comes with...but seriously - velcro? You know that's not going to do the trick when determined little hands want that toy for their mouth, right? It has some good spring action and does bounce really well, but the height adjustment just doesn't provide a great range, so I wish I'd skipped this one and just stuck with the Jumperoo.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Batch

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This was one of our favorite items for our little guy! He loved it so much we bought a second one for daycare. This is much better than the ones without a tray. We have beams in our living room so we made a little modification so he could "hang" out in the middle of the room. He's going on 10 months and still loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: The best out there
customer_reviews.text: The best out there, at the best affordable price. My previous one lasted 3 and a half years before the rope cut through. So we'll just put a little rubber piece inbetween the plastic and rope. And you can tie the rope to lift the jumper higher for your little one. I bought my second one. I would say for the amount this thing got used it does excellent!! Would not recommend anything else.
customer_reviews.author: BianxF21

customer_reviews.title: Check your door moldings first & product dimensions!!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t realize the dimensions required for door moldings before we purchased this. This particular jumper was not able to be set up and used due to our older home with larger molding throughout our home. Had to send back, otherwise would have loved it as the bear trail pattern was super cute and the jumper itself seemed to be very well made.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to assemble, and easy to put up and take down. I took off one star for two reasons: 1) because the shortest setting in a standard-height doorway is just barely short enough for my long-legged baby, and 2) it's a little bit of a pain to take the baby out of. You have to navigate between the straps, and the whole thing comes along when you try to lift the baby out. It can get a little obnoxious. But the baby seems to really like it :) .
customer_reviews.author: Leah M.

customer_reviews.title: A bit annoying
customer_reviews.text: This thing is hard to adjust as many have said, and another thing that annoys me is the toys don't stay. My son yanks the toys off all the time, including ones I add using links. Lastly, I don't see the purpose of the tray, but maybe to others it's useful. Anyway, it works, was cheap, and my son enjoys it so it still gets 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Useful but not ideal for tall babies
customer_reviews.text: My son is in the 60th percentile for height, and even when the jumper is at its highest adjustment his feet are flat on the floor beneath it and his legs are bent. I had to rip out the stitching in the hanging strap and re-stitch it so the strap is shorter. It's also kind of hard to get a wiggly baby into it without two people, one to hold the jumper. But once he's in it he's quite happy, and it's a useful toy to let him burn off some energy before bedtime.
customer_reviews.author: Tina L. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Loved this and it is built to last
customer_reviews.text: This is a great and safe bouncer at an awesome price. This is a great toy for babies that can sit up but not quite crawl. So easy to temporarily install on a large doorway with a molding. The clamp attaches above the molding and it is securely fastened and will not slip or detach. We got a lot of hours out of this jumper and it is easy to take apart to put into the washing machine. After months of heavy use it is still in great shape to pass onto another child or for a future child.
customer_reviews.author: J & L Mason

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I like how this comes with a small table with a rubber bumper, so my baby doesn't crash into the wall/ doorway. It's super easy to install and the only assembly needed is for you to clip in the fabric seat once you take it out of the box. The two yellow clips allow you to switch to any toy you want to attach, so you're not stuck just using the toys it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: Liberty Joy

customer_reviews.title: Great entertainer, but a little short
customer_reviews.text: My son loved playing in this! He would bounce (almost) all of his energy out before he learned to crawl. love the cushioned rim to prevent hitting the wall. My only complaint would be that it doesn't adjust short enough. When I used it in a shorter door frame at my parent's house, it was almost too low for him at 5 months on the highest setting. Luckily, the door frames at our house are a little higher so I got to use it longer. Wish it had more range, but other than that, it's fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This seat is so easy to use on any door frame. It quickly attaches and stays secure. The straps are really easy to adjust. I love being able to move it around the house. I only gave it 4 stars because it can be a bit tricky trying to get the baby out but I think that's just a function of the design. I would recommend it though.
customer_reviews.author: Holly White

customer_reviews.title: Happy baby happy momma
customer_reviews.text: This jumper has given us so many hours to do things hands-free while our daughter gleefully entertains herself... To say it was an amazing purchase is a big understatement. Anyone who has a 4mo old to 1 year old and wants to be able to make them ecstatic while having both hands free to do things for 20-45 minute chunks of time should invest in this thing. And, it's pretty easy to unsnap and bring with you if you want on a car trip, etc- folds up really flat. This thing is a must-have for baby entertaining!
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: not thrilled
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to adjust for my doorways and my granddaughter didn't care for it much but if you can get it to adjust for the height of your baby it would probably be a fun and entertaining way for them to enjoy bouncing.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Our 7 month old baby loves this jumper. This product feels durable and made for active babies who are getting used to their legs. I feel very comfortable leaving our baby in the jumper while we prepare dinner or afford ourselves a shower. I am very pleased with this jumper.
customer_reviews.author: J. Tison

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing you have to assemble out of the box is the seat pad, and it took about 2 minutes for me to attach it without directions. My 5-month old loves this jumper! Things I like: easy to install on the doorframe without tools or adjustments, built-in toy rings make it easy to attach baby's favorite toys, adjustable length means we can use it in a variety of places. Things I don't like: we live in an old house with decorative moldings, and the opening of the mounting bracket isn't quite big enough, so it is unusable in all but one doorway.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Clancy

product_meta.title: Graco Doorway Bumper Jumper, Little Jungle
product_meta.description:
Color:Little Jungle

Graco’s Bumper Jumper doorway baby bounce is a portable, fun way to entertain your child. 
View larger It’s simple to attach the Bumper Jumper to your doorway, thanks to a special attachment.
View larger Two removable toys are included, which give your child an additional way to engage. 
View larger GRACO BUMPER JUMPER DOORWAY BABY BOUNCER, IN LITTLE JUNGLE
JUMP FOR FUN
Your little one will love bouncing up and down in Graco’s Bumper Jumper doorway baby bouncer, in Little Jungle. It’s a portable, fun way to entertain your child, since you can attach it to a door frame to create an instant activity to delight and amuse baby. 

WASHABLE SEAT PAD
It’s simple to keep your baby’s play space tidy, thanks to the removable, washable seat pad. The high-back, nylon seat pad is removable and machine washable, so that you can easily wash it whenever you need. 

SIMPLE IN & OUT
This terrific doorway baby bouncer has special non-twist straps and a plastic dome that helps keep the straps apart, which makes it easier to get your baby in and out. It’s a really great feature that makes Bumper Jumper stand out among doorway baby bouncers.

HIDDEN SAFETY CORD
Of course, safety is the number one priority when it comes to your child. So, the Bumper Jumper has a sturdy spring, with a hidden safety cord. This way, you’ll feel great about offering your little one non-stop jumping fun!

MARK FREE DOOR CLAMP
Graco’s Bumper Jumper features a no mark clamp, so that it won’t leave a mark on your doors at home or away. The spring-loaded clamp won’t mark door moldings when you attach this doorway jumper, so you can attach it just about anywhere for your child’s entertainment. 

EASY ATTACH 
Everything about this great doorway baby bouncer was designed to be fun for baby and easy for you. The special attachment makes it simple to connect it to your doorframe.

ADJUSTABLE DOORWAY BABY BOUNCER
Bumper Jumper can grow with your little one, up to 25 lbs. Just adjust the height adjustable doorway baby bouncer, so that it’s at the right height for maximum jumping fun for your child. 

BUILT-IN TOY TRAY
Bumper Jumper has a great extra feature: a toy tray. This way, your little one can play with toys and bounce at the same time. What fun! 

INTERACTIVE PLAY TOYS
Two soft, removable toys are included, attached to adjustable play rings. Your little one will love these cute, interactive toys that will stimulate her imagination. 

IT’S A JUNGLE
Take your little one on a safari with the cute Little Jungle pattern. Your child will love the adorable giraffes, elephants and monkeys playing across a whimsical background.

KEY FEATURES
 * Attaches Easily: Attaches to doorframe for portable fun
 * Height Adjustable: Height Adjustable for child from 5.5 to 25 lbs.
 * Toy Tray: Play tray for toys
 * 2 Soft Toys: 2 soft, removable, interactive toys attach to adjustable play rings

AGE / WEIGHT RECOMMENDATIONS
 * For children from 5.5 to 25 lbs. 
 * Child must be able to hold head up unassisted
feature_bullets: Doorway jumper features sturdy bounce spring with hidden safety cord for nonstop little leg action and jumping joy
Keep doorways mark free with our no-mark clamp because fun should be the only lasting impression
Baby jumper easily transports from room to room so that your baby can play anywhere you need to be
Seat pad is easily machine washable, or wiped clean, to save you time
Non-twist straps allow quick, easy in and out so you can move baby quickly from room to room

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,816 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
